msg.msgText: The client ID {0} is already associated with a different protocol: {1}.

msgExplanation.p: A client ID which has been remembered, because durable resources are still owned by it, is associated with a protocol different to the protocol being requested.

msgUserResponse.p:
To resolve this issue, try one of the following actions:
Modify the client ID specified by the application.
Delete the disconnected client state to remove the associated durable resources and allow the client ID to be used by a different protocol.
